duties_responsibilities.duty: Laying pipe for storm or sanitation sewers, drains, and water mains.
Grading trenches or culverts, positioning pipe, or sealing joints.
Displaying a professional and courteous attitude to co-workers, supervisors, and the public.
Willingness to travel and work away from home when required.
Willingness to work nights and weekends when necessary.
Strict adherence to safety requirements and procedures as outlined in the Policies, Programs & Procedures Manual.
Willingness to work in a team environment and assist co-workers or supervisors with other duties as required.
